Ministry of Foreign Bangers

Ministry of Foreign Bangers

  • Spotify playlist

The Ministry of Foreign Bangers (BB) makes our Kingdom groovier and more prosperous and works to create diverse and sick parties. BB also supports Dutch nationals abroad 24/7 by supplying only the fattest of tunes. We do all this together with our partners at home and abroad. Working for the Netherlands, worldwide.
